title: Welcome to AGIME
subtitle: Since it's your first time here, let's get you set up with an AI provider so AGIME can work its magic.
quickSetupPlaceholder: Enter your API key (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc.)
unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred during setup.

tips.checkKey: Check that the key is complete and not truncated
tips.verifyCredits: Verify your API key is active and has sufficient credits
tips.ollamaHint: For local Ollama setup, use the "Other Providers" section below

tetrate.title: Tetrate Agent Router
tetrate.description: Secure access to multiple AI models with automatic setup. Free tier available.

openrouter.title: OpenRouter
openrouter.description: Access 200+ models with one API. Pay-per-use pricing.

otherProviders.title: Other Providers
otherProviders.description: Set up additional providers manually through settings.

ollama.title: Ollama Setup
ollama.description: Ollama lets you run AI models for free, private and locally on your computer.
ollama.notDetected: Ollama is not detected on your system
ollama.waitingHint: Once Ollama is installed and running, we'll automatically detect it.
ollama.modelRecommended: This model is recommended for the best experience with AGIME
ollama.detectedToastMsg: Ollama is now running. You can connect to it.
ollama.downloadFailedMsg: Failed to download {{model}}. Please try again.

telemetry.title: Help improve AGIME
telemetry.description: Would you like to help improve AGIME by sharing anonymous usage data? This helps us understand how AGIME is used and identify areas for improvement.
telemetry.collectExtensions: Extensions and tool usage counts (names only)
telemetry.collectSession: Session metrics (duration, interaction count, token usage)
telemetry.privacy: We never collect your conversations, code, tool arguments, error messages, or any personal data. You can change this setting anytime in Settings → App.
